attributes.action: Fund paid time off work for parents who have to home school
attributes.additional_details: The government has set out high standards for remote learning, which stated that pupils in the primary school have to have a minimum of 3 hours homework per day. Parents who working full day from home and having children of different school ages with different and multiple homework are not able to support their childrens' education. Government is asked to support parents by offer them free paid hours off their work to use them to support their children's education.
attributes.background: I want the government to support the education of millions of children in the UK and offer their parents paid time off work so that they can help their children with daily homework.
